member.name: T:GTranslate.Language
member.summary: Provides information about a language. Includes static methods to retrieve instances based on ISO codes or language names.
member.remarks: Due to the way GTranslate handles the supported languages, custom translators should use a custom language class instead.

member.name: M:GTranslate.Language.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using a valid language name or code.
member.param: The language name or code. It can be a ISO 639-1 code, a ISO 639-3 code, a language name, or a language alias.
member.remarks: It is recommended to use or instead.

member.name: M:GTranslate.Language.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,GTranslate.TranslationServices)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified name, ISO codes and supported services.

member.summary: Gets the native name of this language.

member.summary: Gets the supported translation services for this language.

member.summary: Gets a language from a language code, name or alias.

member.returns: The language, or an exception if the language was not found.

member.returns: if the language was found, otherwise .

member.summary: Returns whether supports this language.
member.returns: if supports this language, otherwise .

member.name: T:GTranslate.Results.AggregateTranslationResult
member.summary: Represents the result of translating text using . It wraps a and includes exceptions that have occurred in other translators before receiving the result.

member.summary: Gets the translation result.

member.name: P:GTranslate.Results.AggregateTranslationResult.Exceptions
member.summary: Gets a read-only dictionary of exceptions that have occurred in other translators before receiving the result. The key is the name of the translator that has thrown the exception (the value).

member.summary: Represents the result of transliterating text using . It wraps a and includes exceptions that have occurred in other translators before receiving the result.

member.summary: Gets the transliteration result.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

member.name: M:GTranslate.TranslatorException.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
The translation service that caused this exception.

member.name: M:GTranslate.TranslatorException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:GTranslate.TranslatorException.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
The translation service that caused this exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: T:GTranslate.Translators.AggregateTranslator
member.summary: Represents an aggregate translator. This class groups multiple translation services into a single class for ease of use.

member.name: M:GTranslate.Translators.AggregateTranslator.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:GTranslate.Translators.AggregateTranslator.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection{GTranslate.Translators.ITranslator})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified translators.

member.name: M:GTranslate.Translators.AggregateTranslator.#ctor(GTranslate.Translators.GoogleTranslator,GTranslate.Translators.GoogleTranslator2,GTranslate.Translators.MicrosoftTranslator,GTranslate.Translators.YandexTranslator,GTranslate.Translators.BingTranslator)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified translators.

member.name: M:GTranslate.Translators.AggregateTranslator.TranslateAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Translates a text using the available translation services.
member.returns: A task containing the translation result.
member.remarks: This method will attempt to use all the translation services passed in the constructor, in the order they were provided.
member.exception: Thrown when this translator has been disposed.
Thrown when or are null.
Thrown when no translator supports or .
Thrown when all translators fail to provide a valid result.

member.name: M:GTranslate.Translators.AggregateTranslator.TransliterateAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Transliterates a text using the available translation services.
member.returns: A task containing the transliteration result.
member.remarks: This method will attempt to use all the translation services passed in the constructor, in the order they were provided.
member.exception: Thrown when this translator has been disposed.
Thrown when or are null.
Thrown when a could not be obtained from or .
Thrown when no translator supports or .
Thrown when all translators fail to provide a valid result.

member.name: M:GTranslate.Translators.AggregateTranslator.DetectLanguageAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Detects the language of a text using the available translation services.
member.param: The text to detect its language.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous language detection operation. The task contains the detected language.
member.remarks: This method will attempt to use all the translation services passed in the constructor, in the order they were provided.
member.exception: Thrown when this translator has been disposed.
Thrown when is null.
Thrown when all translators fail to provide a valid result.

member.name: M:GTranslate.Translators.AggregateTranslator.IsLanguageSupported(System.String)

members.member:
Converts text into synthesized speech.
The text to convert. The voice language. Only the languages in are supported. /// The rate (speed) of synthesized speech. Google uses 1 for normal speed and 0.3 for slow speed. A task that represents the asynchronous synthesis operation. The task contains the synthesized speech in a MP3 . Thrown when this translator has been disposed. Thrown when or are null. Thrown when a could not be obtained from . Thrown when is not supported, or an error occurred during the operation.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that an API is experimental and it may change in the future.
member.remarks: This attribute allows call sites to be flagged with a diagnostic that indicates that an experimental feature is used. Authors can use this attribute to ship preview features in their assemblies.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the ID that the compiler will use when reporting a use of the API the attribute applies to.
member.param: The ID that the compiler will use when reporting a use of the API the attribute applies to.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute.DiagnosticId
member.summary: Gets the ID that the compiler will use when reporting a use of the API the attribute applies to.
member.remarks:
The diagnostic ID is shown in build output for warnings and errors.
This property represents the unique ID that can be used to suppress the warnings or errors, if needed.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute.UrlFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL for corresponding documentation. The API accepts a format string instead of an actual URL, creating a generic URL that includes the diagnostic ID.
member.value: The format string that represents a URL to corresponding documentation.
member.remarks: An example format string is https://contoso.com/obsoletion-warnings/{0}.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method or property will ensure that the listed field and property members have not-null values.

member.summary: Initializes the attribute with a field or property member.
member.param: The field or property member that is promised to be not-null.

member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the list of field and property members.
member.param: The list of field and property members that are promised to be not-null.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute.Members
member.summary: Gets field or property member names.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method or property will ensure that the listed field and property members have not-null values when returning with the specified return value condition.

member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition and a field or property member.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be null.
The field or property member that is promised to be not-null.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition and list of field and property members.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be null.
The list of field and property members that are promised to be not-null.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.ReturnValue
member.summary: Gets the return value condition.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.Members
member.summary: Gets field or property member names.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.UnscopedRefAttribute
member.summary: Used to indicate a byref escapes and is not scoped.

remarks.para: There are several cases where the C# compiler treats a as implicitly - where the compiler does not allow the to escape the method.

For example:
for instance methods.
parameters that refer to types.
parameters.
This attribute is used in those instances where the should be allowed to escape.

Applying this attribute, in any form, has impact on consumers of the applicable API. It is necessary for API authors to understand the lifetime implications of applying this attribute and how it may impact their users.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallerArgumentExpressionAttribute

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets the parameter name the expression is retrieved from.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CollectionBuilderAttribute.#ctor(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Initialize the attribute to refer to the method on the type.
member.param: The type of the builder to use to construct the collection.
The name of the method on the builder to use to construct the collection.
member.remarks: must refer to a static method that accepts a single parameter of type and returns an instance of the collection being built containing a copy of the data from that span. In future releases of .NET, additional patterns may be supported.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CollectionBuilderAttribute.BuilderType
member.summary: Gets the type of the builder to use to construct the collection.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CollectionBuilderAttribute.MethodName
member.summary: Gets the name of the method on the builder to use to construct the collection.
member.remarks: This should match the metadata name of the target method. For example, this might be ".ctor" if targeting the type's constructor.

member.remarks: may be used as the name of the receiver in an instance method.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InterpolatedStringHandlerAttribute
member.summary: Indicates the attributed type is to be used as an interpolated string handler.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExternalInit
member.summary: Reserved to be used by the compiler for tracking metadata. This class should not be used by developers in source code.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ModuleInitializerAttribute
member.summary: Used to indicate to the compiler that a method should be called in its containing module's initializer.
member.remarks:
When one or more valid methods with this attribute are found in a compilation, the compiler will emit a module initializer which calls each of the attributed methods.
Certain requirements are imposed on any method targeted with this attribute: - The method must be `static`. - The method must be an ordinary member method, as opposed to a property accessor, constructor, local function, etc. - The method must be parameterless. - The method must return `void`. - The method must not be generic or be contained in a generic type. - The method's effective accessibility must be `internal` or `public`.
The specification for module initializers in the .NET runtime can be found here: https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/main/docs/design/specs/Ecma-335-Augments.md#module-initializer

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RequiredMemberAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a type has required members or that a member is required.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RequiresLocationAttribute
member.summary: Reserved for use by a compiler for tracking metadata. This attribute should not be used by developers in source code.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.SkipLocalsInitAttribute
member.summary: Used to indicate to the compiler that the .locals init flag should not be set in method headers.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified message.
member.param: An optional message associated with this attribute instance.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Versioning.RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute.Message
